    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disposes this game object instance and all of its children. Notice that if it has a parent, it will automatically detach this instance after the current cycle is executed.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable

    • removeChild

      public boolean removeChild​(GameObjectContainer child)
      Remove a child from this game object. Use this function outside the game loop, or it may cause a concurrent modification exception. To remove a child safely, use dispose() instead.
      Parameters:
      child - The child to remove.
      Returns:
      True if the child was removed, false otherwise.
